args.natural_language_statement: Declare a theorem in Lean4 (Mathlib) stating: for z : ℂ, if Complex.abs z < 1 then Complex.abs (Complex.atan z) ≤ (Real.pi / 4) * (Complex.abs z / (1 - Complex.abs z)). End the statement with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
  Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that |arctan z| ≤ (π/4) * (|z| / (1 - |z|)) whenever |z| < 1.
-/

theorem arctan_bound_of_abs_lt_one (z : Complex) (hz : Complex.abs z < 1) :
  Complex.abs (Complex.atan z) ≤ (Real.pi / 4) * (Complex.abs z / (1 - Complex.abs z)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
  Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that |arctan z| ≤ (π/4) * (|z| / (1 - |z|)) whenever |z| < 1.
-/

theorem arctan_bound_of_abs_lt_one (z : Complex) (hz : Complex.abs z < 1) :
  Complex.abs (Complex.arctan z) ≤ (Real.pi / 4) * (Complex.abs z / (1 - Complex.abs z)) := by
  sorry
